report.title: Property Dossier: 123 Main Street, Springfield, IL
report.summary: Snapshot report assembled from frozen assessor, recorder, tax, zoning, and permits datasets.

sections.title: Parcel & Legal
sections.content: Assessor parcel 123-456-789 lists situs 123 Main Street with a 0.23-acre lot and a 1987 build year. Legal description references Lot 12, Block 3.

sections.title: Ownership/Transfers
sections.content: Recorder index shows the most recent deed recorded in 2021 for the current owner, with instrument 2021-12345.

sections.title: Tax & Appraisal
sections.content: The 2024 tax roll lists assessed value and confirms the parcel account remains active with the tax collector.

sections.title: Zoning/Land Use
sections.content: Zoning GIS indicates R-1 single-family residential classification with standard lot coverage limits.

sections.title: Permits & Code
sections.content: Permit history includes a reroof permit in 2019. No code enforcement case files were surfaced in the permit portal.

sections.title: Neighborhood Context
sections.content: Neighborhood statistics show stable occupancy and median home values trending upward over the last three years.

sections.title: Data Gaps & Next Steps
sections.content: Code enforcement case history was not located in the permit portal. Confirm with the Springfield code enforcement office or request records through the city clerk.
